channel.title: Catalyst reports on DeNS
channel.description: Recent content in Catalyst reports on DeNS

item.title: Milestone 3
item.description: DeNS Query Layer Development Milestone Outputs A package that listens to Cardano transactions that are related to DeNS and populates a relational database. This serves as the main query layer for other applications like DNS analytics (we expect this to be particularly useful for security-related applications) but also as the database from which traditional DNS service integration can take place. The package which listens to Cardano transactions that are related to DeNS and populates a relational database can be found here.
